description: This RARE freehold row home (no strata fees) is right out of a magazine. Built in 2014 & freshly renovated from top to bottom, 3382 Mason is an end unit with no neighbour to the east. The main floor has been completely reimagined with designer finishes & a gorgeous new kitchen, while the primary ensuite is totally custom. No expense spared. The covered south-facing patio has gas BBQ & fire pit & is perfect for year-round entertaining.detached garage off the back lane fits one car (plus extra storage).Upstairs youâ€™ll find 3 bedrooms & 2 full bathrooms, while the lower level offers a flexible layout with a living room, bathroom, laundry & the 4th bedroom (currently a home office/gym).With over 2,600 sq. ft. of stylish living across three levels & priced under $1.45M. OPEN HOUSE CANCELLED
